title: Judge Common Sense + Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Eddie's Kids Sing Along to the Radio
itunes:title: Judge Common Sense + Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Eddie's Kids Sing Along to the Radio
description:
Bobby presides as Judge Common Sense, Lunchbox takes a crack at guessing female listeners' weights, we get to hear Eddie's kids sing some hits, and Amy has a major Time Marches On moment at her yoga studio.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
